title: BTS star Namjoon gets an entire forest for his birthday
text:
#HappyBirthdayNamjoon trending on Twitter as BTS leader turns 25

If you’re lucky enough on your birthday, you might have some of your besties over for cake and pizza.

If you’re even luckier, you might get a few gifts, too. Maybe a new video game or a comfy new BTS sweater.

If you’re BTS leader Namjoon (a.k.a. RM), on the other hand, a sweater isn’t going to cut it. After all, you have an entire army behind you.

And the BTS fanbase — also known as ARMY — is known for grand gestures.

Earlier this month, they boycotted the MTV VMAs to host their own award show on Twitter using the hashtag #BTSMVAS.

We want to thank you all for participating in this project! It started as a way to speak out against gatekeepers in the industry, but become a beautiful ARMY x BTS memory!



Let's always fight for @BTS_twt and speak up when we know something isn't right. #BTSMVAs #BTSMVAwards pic.twitter.com/7mw3TVOvZ0 — #BTSMVAs [REST] �� (@Highlight_Army) August 27, 2019

So what would an appropriate gift from ARMY look like for RM’s bday?

One that an entire army is capable of doing, of course. For Namjoon, they planted a forest in the Philippines.

��Plant Today, Save Tomorrow Year 2��



To celebrate RM's birthday, we planted 600 indigenous trees in Sierra Madre, the longest mountain range in PH, hoping to leave a legacy for RM & ARMY and be part of the solution to climate change.#weloveyouTREEthousand#Namjooning #나무 �� pic.twitter.com/Adb0tMqRWV — Kim Namjoon PH �� (@KimNamjoonPHL) September 8, 2019

Believe it or not, this isn’t out of left field for ARMY.

Earlier this year, the United Nations awarded them the recognition of Top Rank Sustainable Global Group for their work in sustainability.

So what was Namjoon doing on his 25th birthday (or 26th, based on Korean age)?

Blowing a kiss, of course.

To respond to the grand bday gesture, the BTS official Twitter page tweeted out this vid of Namjoon showing some love.

Let’s not forget that there are seven members of BTS, though, and Jimin’s birthday is around the corner on Oct. 13.

But how do you top planting a forest? We’ll have to wait and see!
description: BTS leader Namjoon’s ARMY fanbase plants an entire forest for his 25th birthday on Sept. 12.
